thread.title: Great Scott! USA Today pays tribute with 'Back to the Future' edition
thread.title_full: Great Scott! USA Today pays tribute with 'Back to the Future' edition

title: Great Scott! USA Today pays tribute with 'Back to the Future' edition
text:
Great Scott! USA Today pays tribute with 'Back to the Future' edition Alternate cover features hilarious fake headlines UPDATED 7:58 AM PDT Oct 21, 2015 CNNMoney, Universal Pictures, MGM, 20th Century Fox, Hendo Hover, Toyota, 'Back in Time' Photos CNNMoney, Universal Pictures, MGM, 20th Century Fox, Hendo Hover, Toyota, 'Back in Time' 
"Back to the Future" protagonist Marty McFly is national news today. Social media anger erupts over 'Back to the Future' Pepsi 
What started out as a love letter to fans of an adored time-travel classic may end up being a sore spot for Pepsi. 
The company appears to have quickly sold out of "Pepsi Perfect," its homage to "Back to the Future," leaving legions of fans disappointe... More Back to the Future then now - intro 
Wednesday marks the unofficial celebration of "Back to the Future" Day, the Oct. 21, 2015, date that Marty McFly travels to in 1989's "Back to the Future Part II." To mark the occasion, check up on the stars of the blockbuster film series. From NBCU via CNN View Large Photos 
Wednesday marks the unofficial celebration of "Back to the Future" Day, the Oct. 21, 2015, date that Marty McFly travels to in 1989's "Back to the Future Part II." To mark the occasion, check up on the stars of the blockbuster film series. From NBCU via CNN 
USA Today has released an alternate cover that perfectly recreates the morning edition Marty finds in "Back to the Future II." 
The cover features hilarious fake headlines, including "Cubs sweep series in 5" and "Marshall runs 3 minute mile." 
Check out the cover below: 
Calling all Back to the Future Trilogy fans: Does this look familiar? You can own one tomorrow -- grab a USA TODAY newspaper on Thursday! And Happy Back To the Future Day.
